LanguageData.AgonyPulse.label: імпульс агонії
LanguageData.AgonyPulse.description: Чистий спроєктований душевний біль, викликаний шоковим імпульсом агонії. Воно переповнює, але відносно швидко розсіюється.
LanguageData.AgonyPulse.stages.acute.label: гострий
LanguageData.AgonyPulse.stages.lingering.label: затяжний
LanguageData.AwokenHypnosis.label: гіпноз пробудженого
LanguageData.AwokenHypnosis.description: This person has been hypnotized by an awoken unnatural corpse. Транс абсолютний, але якщо пробуджений труп відведе погляд, то гіпноз закінчиться.
LanguageData.BlissLobotomy.label: блаженна лоботомія
LanguageData.BlissLobotomy.description: Цю людину психічно лоботомізували, що привело її до стану блаженства, але обмежило її когнітивні функції.
LanguageData.BloodRage.label: кривава лють
LanguageData.BloodRage.description: Ця істота зазнала впливу кривавого дощу - психофлюїду, що викликає лють. Ця лють зростатиме доти, доки вони перебуватимуть під кривавим дощем, що врешті-решт призведе до насильницького психічного розладу. У деяких людей ефект розвивається швидше, залежно від їхніх особливостей, психічної чутливості та випадкових індивідуальних відмінностей.
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.very_mild.label: дуже легкий
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.mild.label: легкий
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.moderate.label: помірний
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.severe.label: серйозний
LanguageData.BloodRage.stages.extreme.label: екстремальний
LanguageData.BrainwipeComa.label: кома стертого мозку
LanguageData.BrainwipeComa.description: Цій людині стерли пам'ять. Насильницька природа процесу призвела до того, що вона впала в кому.
LanguageData.CorpseTorment.label: трупні муки
LanguageData.CorpseTorment.description: Ця людина має психічний зв'язок з трупом, який здається її точною копією. Вони зробили щось, що розлютило його, внаслідок чого втратили свідомість.
LanguageData.CrumbledMind.label: розбитий розум
LanguageData.CrumbledMind.description: Ця людина втратила більшу частину своїх когнітивних здібностей, що заважає їй виконувати складні завдання. Вони є лушпинням свого колишнього "я".\n\nЦей стан невиліковний.
LanguageData.CrumblingMind.label: крихкий розум
LanguageData.CrumblingMind.description: Ця людина переживає стрімке погіршення психічного стану. Протягом кількох днів вони будуть нездатні до більшості видів робіт. За наявності достатньої кількості технологій, таких як сироватка зцілення, цей стан все ще можна виправити. Втім, незабаром вона стане постійною.
LanguageData.CrumblingMind.stages.mild.label: легкий
LanguageData.CrumblingMind.stages.moderate.label: помірний
LanguageData.CrumblingMind.stages.extreme.label: екстремальний
LanguageData.CrumblingMindUndiagnosedCreepjoiner.desc: Ця людина переживає стрімке погіршення психічного стану. Протягом кількох днів вони будуть нездатні до більшості видів робіт. За наявності достатньої кількості технологій, таких як сироватка зцілення, цей стан все ще можна виправити. Втім, незабаром вона стане постійною.
LanguageData.CrumblingMindUndiagnosedCreepjoiner.comp: {PAWN_nameDef} показує ранні ознаки важкого стану, який незабаром спричинить важке погіршення розумових здібностей. {SURGEON_nameDef} ще не може точно сказати, що спричинило це, але {PAWN_nameDef} зараз дуже захворіє протягом наступних кількох днів.

{PAWN_nameDef} почав відчувати головні болі та благає про допомогу. {PAWN_pronoun} не може ясно мислити та втрачає {PAWN_possessive} когнітивну функцію. {PAWN_nameDef} стверджує, що {PAWN_pronoun} бачив ілюзію майбутнього. Протягом кількох днів розум {PAWN_possessive} розпадеться, і {PAWN_pronoun} стане неспроможним виконувати більшість завдань.\n\nЦе захворювання наразі можна вилікувати за допомогою відповідної технології, як от сироватка зцілення, але скоро вона стане постійною.
LanguageData.CrumblingMindUndiagnosedDuplication.desc: Ця людина переживає стрімке погіршення психічного стану. Протягом кількох днів вони будуть нездатні до більшості видів робіт. За наявності достатньої кількості технологій, таких як сироватка зцілення, цей стан все ще можна виправити. Втім, незабаром вона стане постійною.
LanguageData.CrumblingMindUndiagnosedDuplication.comp: {PAWN_nameDef} показує ранні ознаки важкого стану, який незабаром спричинить важке погіршення розумових здібностей. {SURGEON_nameDef} ще не може точно сказати, що спричинило це, але {PAWN_nameDef} зараз дуже захворіє протягом наступних кількох днів.

{PAWN_nameDef} почав відчувати головні болі та благає про допомогу. {PAWN_pronoun} не може ясно мислити та втрачає {PAWN_possessive} когнітивну функцію. Something has gone wrong in the duplication process.\n\nWith sufficient technology, like a healer mech serum, the condition can still be reversed. However, if not treated, it will soon become permanent.
LanguageData.CubeComa.label: cube coma
LanguageData.CubeComa.description: This person was connected to a golden cube and then separated from it. Severing the link this way has put them in a coma.
LanguageData.CubeInterest.label: cube interest
LanguageData.CubeInterest.description: This person is drawn to the golden cube. If separated from the cube for too long, they'll start to experience negative effects.
LanguageData.CubeInterest.reportStringOverrides.0.rep: Wandering and thinking about the cube.
LanguageData.CubeInterest.reportStringOverrides.1.rep: Wandering and thinking about the cube.
LanguageData.CubeInterest.stages.curious.label: curious
LanguageData.CubeInterest.stages.fascinated.label: fascinated
LanguageData.CubeInterest.stages.obsessed.label: obsessed
LanguageData.CubeRage.label: cube anger
LanguageData.CubeRage.description: This person is upset that their cube sculptures have been destroyed. Continuing to destroy their sculptures may cause them to become violent.
LanguageData.CubeRage.comps.HediffComp_CauseMentalSta: {PAWN_nameDef} can no longer control {PAWN_possessive} anger. Too many of {PAWN_possessive} precious cube sculptures have been destroyed.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef} has flown into a berserk rage!
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawal.label: cube withdrawal
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawal.description: This person obsessively wants to find their golden cube. Their skin itches and their mind races, thinking of ways to get closer to the cube. Their symptoms will get worse until they play with the cube.
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawal.stages.inital.label: inital
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawal.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.CubeWithdrawal.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.DarknessExposure.label: darkness exposure
LanguageData.DarknessExposure.description: This person is immersed in the unnatural darkness. Creatures or influences in the darkness will harm them if they stay too long.
LanguageData.DarkPsychicShock.label: dark psychic shock
LanguageData.DarkPsychicShock.description: Part of this person's neural pattern has been disrupted by a dark psychic power. The shock from this process has left them in a temporary coma.
LanguageData.DeathRefusal.label: death refusal
LanguageData.DeathRefusal.description: This person is infused with a seed of nanoscale archotech machines that can recreate life. After they die, the archites will sustain their mind and, when they choose, rebuild their body. The flesh will rapidly reform, replacing missing organs and healing wounds. The process is not perfect and may cause scarring or other health complications. This can only be done a certain number of times.
LanguageData.DeathRefusalCreepJoiner.label: death refusal
LanguageData.DeathRefusalCreepJoiner.description: This person is infused with a seed of nanoscale archotech machines that can recreate life. After they die, the archites will sustain their mind and, when they choose, rebuild their body. The flesh will rapidly reform, replacing missing organs and healing wounds. The process is not perfect and may cause scarring or other health complications. This can only be done a certain number of times.
LanguageData.DeathRefusalSickness.label: death refusal sickness
LanguageData.DeathRefusalSickness.description: After-effects of death refusal. This person has returned from the dead.
LanguageData.DisruptorFlash.label: disruptor flash
LanguageData.DisruptorFlash.description: The initial psychic burst from a disruptor flare has left this creature dazed.
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.label: duplicate sickness
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.description: Psychic interference between this person and their duplicate is causing slow mental deterioration. As long as multiple copies of this person are alive, the condition will keep getting worse. However, the condition will not be lethal.
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.comps.HediffComp_Messa: {0_nameDef} is now suffering from duplicate sickness.
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.comps.HediffComp_Surge: {PAWN_nameDef} is suffering from duplicate sickness. Psychic interference between this person and their duplicate is causing slow mental deterioration. As long as multiple copies of this person are alive, the condition will keep getting worse.
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.stages.initial-0.label: initial
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.stages.initial-1.label: initial
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.DuplicateSickness.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.FrenzyField.label: frenzy field
LanguageData.FrenzyField.description: This person is under the influence of a psychic field which sharpens their mental energy. They're channeling the nervous anger to move and work faster. However, any mental breaks will be violent.
LanguageData.FrenzyField.stages.very_mild.label: very mild
LanguageData.FrenzyField.stages.mild.label: mild
LanguageData.FrenzyField.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.FrenzyField.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.HoraxianInvisibility.label: dark psychic invisibility
LanguageData.HoraxianInvisibility.description: This creature is psychically twisting the perceptions of humans, animals, and machines in the vicinity in such a way as to seem invisible. The eye receives their image as normal but the mind cannot perceive it.
LanguageData.Inhumanized.label: inhumanization
LanguageData.Inhumanized.description: This person's mind is dominated by the psychic patterns of the void. They are completely disconnected from human concerns of family, friendship, and love. Their experience of reality is distant and muted, guided by the psychic rhythm of a dark hyperintelligence.
LanguageData.JuggernautSerum.label: juggernaut serum
LanguageData.JuggernautSerum.description: A serum is super-powering this person's musculature, making them stronger and faster, but reducing their mood due to discomfort.
LanguageData.LightExposure.label: light exposure
LanguageData.LightExposure.description: Even the slightest exposure to light causes great discomfort to this creature, slowing it and weakening its attacks.
LanguageData.LightExposure.stages.initial.label: initial
LanguageData.LightExposure.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.LightExposure.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.LightExposure.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.Metalblood.label: metalblood
LanguageData.Metalblood.description: This creature has the metalblood compound in their bloodstream. This substance can rapidly harden the flesh when it anticipates a blow, making the user more resistant to damage. However, the bioferrite-based chemistry of this serum also makes the user particularly vulnerable to fire.
LanguageData.MetalhorrorImplant.label: metalhorror implantation
LanguageData.MetalhorrorImplant.description: A gestating creature of metallic horror. Starting from a tiny archometallic seed, it will quickly take control of the nervous system, grow, and extend throughout the host's body until it is ready to reveal itself. Once discovered, you can use the surgical inspection operation to cause a metalhorror to emerge from its host. Be prepared for a fight.
LanguageData.MetalhorrorImplant.possiblePathways.0.ex: Implanted before arrival at your colony
LanguageData.MetalhorrorSpeedBoost.label: machine speed
LanguageData.MetalhorrorSpeedBoost.description: Rapid movement driven by a surge of unnatural archotechnological strength. This burst of speed cannot last long.
LanguageData.MindNumbSerum.label: mind-numb serum
LanguageData.MindNumbSerum.description: This person's neural patterns are being moderated by an exotic serum. They're unaffected by the highs and lows of human emotion. They will never have a mental break but they will also never feel inspired.
LanguageData.NeurosisPulse.label: neurosis pulse
LanguageData.NeurosisPulse.description: This person has been affected by a psychic pulse of motivated, neurotic emotions. This makes them irritable, but also motivates them to work faster.
LanguageData.PainField.label: pain field
LanguageData.PainField.description: A searing pain caused by the presence of a psychically active entity nearby. The effect intensifies when the entity is more active.
LanguageData.PleasurePulse.label: pleasure pulse
LanguageData.PleasurePulse.description: This person has been impacted by a psychic pulse of pleasurable sensations and emotions. They feel unnaturally happy, distracting them from their work.
LanguageData.PsychicallyDead.label: psychically dead
LanguageData.PsychicallyDead.description: This person's psychic presence has been consumed and burned away, leaving them cut off from psychic phenomena.
LanguageData.PsychicTrance.label: psychic trance
LanguageData.PsychicTrance.description: This person's mind is linked with an ambient psychic field from a distant archotech. They have been placed in a trance-like state. The unnatural influence sustains them - they have almost no need for food or rest.
LanguageData.Psychophage.label: psychophage
LanguageData.Psychophage.description: This person has devoured the psychic presence of another, making them more psychically sensitive for a period of time.
LanguageData.RageSpeed.label: rage speed
LanguageData.RageSpeed.description: This creature has been enraged by its wounds and is moving faster.
LanguageData.Regeneration.label: regeneration
LanguageData.Regeneration.description: This creature is experiencing an impossibly fast rate of regeneration supported by a distant archotechnological engine. They will heal nearly any wound in a short time.
LanguageData.Regeneration.stages.unnatural.label: unnatural
LanguageData.Regeneration.stages.impossible.label: impossible
LanguageData.RevenantHypnosis.label: revenant hypnosis
LanguageData.RevenantHypnosis.description:
This person has been hypnotized by a revenant and remains linked to it. They ramble about nightmarish creatures while their unblinking eyes stare at invisible horrors.

After hypnotizing a victim, the revenant will hibernate somewhere on the same map as its victim.

Killing the revenant will end the hypnosis. A hidden revenant can be revealed by disruptor flares, explosives, EMP, firefoam, or by being lit on fire.
LanguageData.ShardHolder.label: shard holder
LanguageData.ShardHolder.description: This creature will drop a shard when defeated. This text is visible in dev mode only.
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.label: sleep suppression
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.description: This person's brain chemistry is being affected by a psychic pulsation, preventing the buildup of fatigue toxins. This reduces their need for sleep.
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.stages.very_mild.label: very mild
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.stages.mild.label: mild
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.SleepSuppression.stages.extreme.label: extreme
LanguageData.VoidShock.label: void shock
LanguageData.VoidShock.description: This individual has witnessed the void. Their mind reels from the shock, overflowing with visions of infinite roiling, squirming, searing darkness stretching into the bottomless abyss from every surface and every screaming face.
LanguageData.Voidsight.label: voidsight
LanguageData.Voidsight.description: This person has ingested a drug which enhanced their perception of dark psychic phenomena. They will gain more knowledge when studying dark psychic phenomena and entities. Their psychic sensitivity is also increased.
LanguageData.VoidTouched.label: void touched
LanguageData.VoidTouched.description: This person has seen the depths of the void and drank from its essence. It lives inside them still, guiding their actions and twisting their flesh. It has turned their hair brittle and white. They no longer need sleep or comfort. The void provides for them.
